Free Custom Design Consultation +

Every project starts with a free custom design consultation. We'll discuss your needs, space, budget, and vision to understand exactly what you're looking for. No obligation, just expert advice from 30+ years of experience.

Lifetime Guarantee +

We're so confident in the quality of our wood sports lockers that we offer a lifetime guarantee on every locker we build. Our unique modular design means damaged parts can be replaced individually—no need to replace the entire locker.

Made in Canada +

100% manufactured in North America. We support local manufacturing and maintain the highest quality standards. Our family business is personally invested in every project—your success is our reputation.

Sport-Specific Solutions +

Every sport has unique equipment needs. We design lockers optimized for football, hockey, basketball, baseball, soccer, and lacrosse. From spacious football lockers to reinforced hockey lockers, we have solutions for every sport.

Why Wood Lockers Outperform Metal

After 30+ years in the business, we've seen it all. Wood lockers aren't just a trend—they're a superior choice for any serious athletic program.

Prestige & Aesthetics

Wood lockers create a professional, prestigious atmosphere that metal simply can't match. They transform locker rooms from storage spaces into culture-building environments.

Durability That Lasts

When properly cared for, wood outlasts metal. Our lockers have been in use for 15+ years and still look professional. Metal dents, rusts, and shows wear quickly.

Natural Comfort

Wood provides natural warmth and breathability. Metal lockers are cold, noisy, and create an industrial feel that doesn't inspire athletes.

Unlimited Customization

Wood allows for unlimited design options—team colors, logos, player names. Metal lockers are cookie-cutter units with limited customization.

Learn Our Story

Every sport has unique equipment needs. We design custom lockers optimized for your game.

Football Lockers

Spacious and ventilated for helmets, pads, and cleats

Hockey Lockers

Basketball Lockers

Baseball Lockers

Customized storage for all baseball equipment

Soccer Lockers

Organized compartments for soccer gear
